title: Drawing, "Facade of Santa Cecilia in Bologna; Architectural Studies", 1811–14
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 62, 124, Bologna monumenti del quattro cento, Santa ce...Bologna. Inscribed in the verso: geometrica solida.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Facade of Santa Cecilia in Bologna; four studies of capitals; sepulchra; three pilasters; Verso: geometrical figures in plane and solid.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Facade of Santa Cecilia in Bologna; Architectural Studies", 1811–14.
1811–14. Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2743.
